error_file_not_uploaded: File not uploaded. Please send a file using the 'file' field.
error_author_missing: Author information is missing. Please send the 'author' field.
error_policy_violation: Security policy violation: Video cannot be stamped because it is older than 24 hours. (Created: {{creationTime}})
error_forbidden_job_access: Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this job.
error_server_config_keys_missing: Server configuration error: Signing keys/certificates are missing.
login_prompt_new: Log in to access your account.
no_api_keys_yet: You don't have any API keys yet.
register_prompt: Create a new account to try the platform.
go_to_login_link: Already have an account? Log in.
go_to_register_link: Don't have an account? Sign up.
feedback_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
confirm_delete_key: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
no_activity_found: No activity found for the selected range.
forgot_password_prompt: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
feedback_reset_link_sent: If this email address is registered in our system, a reset link has been sent.
reset_password_prompt: Please enter your new password. It must be at least 8 characters long.
feedback_password_updated_success: Your password has been updated successfully! Please log in.
dashboard_subheading: Manage your subscription, usage, and API keys from a single place.
api_keys_subtitle: Manage the keys that have access to your APIs.
api_keys_empty_description: Use the button above to create your first key.
api_key_masked_hint: Only the beginning and end of the key are shown for security.
new_key_notice_title: Your new API key is ready
new_key_notice_message: Copy and store this key securely. It will not be shown again after you dismiss this message.
error_key_copy_failed: Unable to copy the key. Please copy it manually.
error_create_key_failed: We couldn't create a new API key.
error_delete_key_failed: The API key could not be deleted.
error_api_keys_fetch_failed: API keys could not be loaded.
error_api_key_generation_failed: We couldn't generate a new API key. Please try again later.
error_api_key_limit_reached: You've reached the maximum number of API keys allowed for your plan ({{limit}}). Remove an existing key or upgrade your plan.
error_tenant_context_missing: We couldn't verify your session. Please sign in again.
analytics_subtitle: Review how your latest operations are performing.
